Event.PageTitle: SIS Annual Sports Event 2010 - United Kingdom
Event.MetaKeywords: sis sports event, sis 20-20 cricket match
Event.MetaDescription: Come and join South Indian Society Annual Sports event 2010 at Harrow, London on 10th Jul 2010.
Event.Address: Recreation Ground, Pinner Road, Harrow, Middlesex, HA1 1PB.
Event.Maindescription:
Please join us for the SIS Annual Sports event, that will be held on JULY 10, 2010 SATURDAY from 10 AM TO 2 PM. at the RECREATION GROUND, PINNER ROAD, HARROW, MIDDLESEX HA1 1PB (Adults: £5 / Children up to 12 years £ 2)

  • Participate or cheer a team in the 20/20 cricket match for Men / Boys followed by a game of 10/10 for beginners including ladies
  • Challenge yourselves to various creative and entertaining games that will be organised parallel to the 20-20 cricket
  • Participate in our Thinnaik katcheri ( gossip group)! - on from 10.00 to 14/00
  • Just relax and enjoy all activities around!! including the snack lunch that will be provided!

We plan to have 2 teams to play the 20-20 match. If you are interested in playing, please confirm and register your participation with Subbu - 0783746 6338 or PK - 01296 748336 on or before Sunday 5th July. In order for the teams to be balanced, when you register, we request you to furnish the following information : What is your speciality (batsman / bowler - fast or spin / wicket keeper and if you are still playing regular cricket etc.). Alternatively please fill your details in the attached form and have it mailed to southindiansociety.london2010@googlemail.com

While every effort would be made to include as many of you as possible, inclusion in the team will be on a 1st come basis and therefore we request you to please register your participation immediately.

]]>
